reviews.review_text:
Bombil deserves a solid 5 stars for their exceptional thali, inviting ambience, and impeccable service! I was thoroughly impressed by the variety and flavors of the dishes in their thaliâ€”it tasted absolutely divine.

The staff was attentive and welcoming, which added to the overall experience. Without a doubt, this has become one of my favorite places in Goa. Highly recommended

Regularly visiting for having fish thali with an office colleague. I always have veg thali.. but the food tastes really great.. highly recommend.. reservation required otherwise you have to wait for sometime.. atmosphere is authentic goan. The staff are polite.. once a week there is live music...

FOOD

Loved the Modso thali
U can also try surmai thali.
Rice and Fish is unlimited
Must say they have made sure that they serve authentic food.
Recommended dishes
Modso thali
Prawns rava fry
Chicken Cafreal

DRINKS
What no one talks about in reviews for bombil restaurant is their unique kokum cocktail infused with vodka ,kokum syrup, crushed mint, sugarcane stick on top and pink salt.

FOOD 5/5.
DRINKS 5/5.
ATMOSPHERE 5/5

So if I am not wrong the place is made out in the baramda (compound)of a traditional Goan house.
The main wall has real crab shells with guest reviews and comments.
The place has great vibe. A traditional Goan feel.

SERVICE
Staff is well trained and they suggest their best dishes and cocktails.  Although I had long waiting time but Joseph managed to make sure I get my table on time as it's bit too busy during afternoons.
Very warm and welcoming staff.
They made sure the food was on table in 10 minutes from the time I ordered.
